Articles.Content:
My game keeps hanging up on the loading screen once it gets to verifying the DLC.

It looks like its the routine mission manager, but i had that mod before and it was working earlier today, not sure what broke it, anyone have any ideas?

 

https://ibb.co/n3XdRQj

Edited April 10, 2020 by crash087

Try uninstalling and reinstalling the problem mod, and if that doesn’t fix it check you have a compatible mod version for your version of KSP (Which version are you using anyway? And what other mods do you have?)
